content.prompt: Given an integer variable n entered by the user from keyboard, complete the following code in order to figure what is the maximum power of 3 that is lower or equal than n. Store the result in an integer variable called maxPower. E.g. 1: if the value of n entered by the user is 2, the value of maxPower will be 1. E.g. 2: if the value of n entered by the user is 500, the value of maxPower will be 243. E.g. 3: if the value of n entered by the user is 27, the value of maxPower will be 27.

uses.used_by: Jordan Barria, Jordan Barria - University Of Pittsburgh
